definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
Halifax (name)/Halifax city, capital of Nova Scotia, Canada/Halifax, town in West Yorkshire, England
Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳

sentences.english: Afghanistan's Second Vice President Abdul Karim Khalili was present at the meeting as guest of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗第二副總統哈利利作爲東道國客人出席會議。

sentences.english: Dumbledore took Harry in his arms and turned toward the Dursleys' house.
sentences.chinese: 鄧布利多把哈利抱在懷裏，朝德思禮家走去。

sentences.english: Harris went on top in the last lap .
sentences.chinese: 哈利斯在最後一圈跑到了最前面。

sentences.english: My old friend Harrison, had lived in the Mediterranean for years before he returned to England.
sentences.chinese: 哈利遜是我的舊友，僑居地中海多年，近返英國。

sentences.english: Harry pulled his copy of Advanced Potion-Making out of his bag and looked up Felix Felicis.
sentences.chinese: 哈利從書包裏抽出《高級魔藥製作》，查找福靈劑。

sentences.english: Harry doesn't do a lot of especially interesting things in Deathly Hallows.
sentences.chinese: 哈利在《死亡聖器》裏並沒有太多出彩的戲份。

sentences.english: But Dobby had to come. Dobby has to protect Harry Potter. To warn him.
sentences.chinese: 可是多比非來不可，多比必須保護哈利波特，警告他。

sentences.english: And still. Harry hadn"t asked Cho to the ball."
sentences.chinese: 哈利仍舊沒有開口邀請秋去舞會。

sentences.english: Harry avoided his yellowish eyes as they scanned the Hall;
sentences.chinese: 他用那雙黃眼睛掃視着禮堂，哈利避開了他的目光。

sentences.english: Hello ? My name 's Tom Harris. Is Adam there, please?
sentences.chinese: 喂？我叫湯姆哈利斯。請問亞當在嗎？

sentences.english: Single-handedly wins the Potter vs Twilight ‘who has the maddest fans' debate.
sentences.chinese: 在暮光和哈利波特“誰是最瘋狂粉絲”的比賽中勝出。

sentences.english: As Harry had expected, Hermione raised her hand.
sentences.chinese: 不出哈利所料，赫敏舉起了她的手。

sentences.english: Faster than a turbo-powered broomstick, Harry Potter has started flying off the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 哈利波特開始飛下書架，速度比渦輪驅動的掃帚還快。

sentences.english: If I were you, I would explain to Harry what happened.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是你，我會去向哈利解釋事情的經過。

sentences.english: As Voldemort, defeat Harry Potter in Duelling Club.
sentences.chinese: 在決鬥俱樂部中以伏地魔戰勝哈利波特。

sentences.english: You’re sort of missing the entire ‘advertising is lying’ concept, Harry.
sentences.chinese: 你對‘廣告就是謊言’這個概念根本一竅不通，哈利。

definition: Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳
Pelé (1940-), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star
